creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp from a single app.

Explore the Amazon Shopping app now and shop in…

o Fashion:
Discover the latest trends from your favourite brands for Women, Men, Girls, Boys, and Babies. Update your new-season wardrobe with trendy dresses, fresh denim, stylish trainers, and modern bags.
o Electronics:
Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books
Find new releases, best sellers and all time classics.
o Sport & Outdoor:
Explore a huge range of top-brand clothing and equipment in fitness, camping & hiking, cycling, winter sports, golf, running, swimming, football, sports technology, rugby, water sports and much more.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products in tech, fashion and more!

Seattle, WA 98109
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favourite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
Enjoy our latest update where we have fixed some bugs and improved our app to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books
Find new releases, best sellers and all time classics.
o Sport & Outdoor:
Explore a huge range of top-brand clothing and equipment in fitness, camping & hiking, cycling, winter sports, golf, running, swimming, football, sports technology, rugby, water sports and much more.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera.

Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp from a single app.

Explore the Amazon Shopping app now and shop in…

o Fashion:
Discover the latest trends from your favourite brands for Women, Men, Girls, Boys, and Babies. Update your new-season wardrobe with trendy dresses, fresh denim, stylish trainers, and modern bags.
o Electronics:
Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books

o Sport & Outdoor:

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.

* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.

* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp from a single app.

Explore the Amazon Shopping app now and shop in…

o Fashion:
Discover the latest trends from your favourite brands for Women, Men, Girls, Boys, and Babies. Update your new-season wardrobe with trendy dresses, fresh denim, stylish trainers, and modern bags.
o Electronics:
Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books
Find new releases, best sellers and all time classics.
o Sport & Outdoor:
Explore a huge range of top-brand clothing and equipment in fitness, camping & hiking, cycling, winter sports, golf, running, swimming, football, sports technology, rugby, water sports and much more.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 7.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera.

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 7.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to but it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products right from your Android device.

appDetails.developerAddress:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Access popular pages quickly with our new shortcuts. Tap and hold the Amazon app icon to access your Orders, Daily Deals, Shopping Cart, and Search.
AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favorite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
Closet is a new feature in the Amazon App in the U.S. that helps you discover outfit ideas based on what you already own. Just open the menu in the Amazon App, go to Programs and Features, and tap Closet.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to but it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products right from your Android device.

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp from a single app.

Explore the Amazon Shopping app now and shop in…

o Fashion:
Discover the latest trends from your favourite brands for Women, Men, Girls, Boys, and Babies. Update your new-season wardrobe with trendy dresses, fresh denim, stylish trainers, and modern bags.
o Electronics:
Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books
Find new releases, best sellers and all time classics.
o Sport & Outdoor:
Explore a huge range of top-brand clothing and equipment in fitness, camping & hiking, cycling, winter sports, golf, running, swimming, football, sports technology, rugby, water sports and much more.

Download the app now and start shopping!

* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to but it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products right from your Android device.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to but it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

- Convenient

No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp from a single app.

Explore the Amazon Shopping app now and shop in…

o Fashion:
Discover the latest trends from your favourite brands for Women, Men, Girls, Boys, and Babies. Update your new-season wardrobe with trendy dresses, fresh denim, stylish trainers, and modern bags.
o Electronics:
Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to but it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products right from your Android device.

Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Explore the Amazon Shopping app now and shop in…

o Fashion:
Discover the latest trends from your favourite brands for Women, Men, Girls, Boys, and Babies. Update your new-season wardrobe with trendy dresses, fresh denim, stylish trainers, and modern bags.
o Electronics:
Check out our deals! Save on cameras, headphones & earphones, MP3 players, hi-fi speaker systems, GPS devices, TVs, laptops, tablets, accessories, as well as Alexa-enabled devices.
o Books
Find new releases, best sellers and all time classics.
o Sport & Outdoor:
Explore a huge range of top-brand clothing and equipment in fitness, camping & hiking, cycling, winter sports, golf, running, swimming, football, sports technology, rugby, water sports and much more.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to buy it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

title: Amazon Shopping

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey_: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice, and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers:_ By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g., www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse (http://www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse)) and Privacy Notice (e.g., www.amazon.com/privacy (http://www.amazon.com/privacy)) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products in tech, fashion and more!

appDetails.developerAddress:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Access popular pages quickly with our new shortcuts. Tap and hold the Amazon app icon to access your Orders, Daily Deals, Shopping Cart, and Search.
AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favourite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
Enjoy our latest update where we have fixed some bugs and improved our app to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to buy it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey_: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice, and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers:_ By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g., www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse (http://www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse)) and Privacy Notice (e.g., www.amazon.com/privacy (http://www.amazon.com/privacy)) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

title: Amazon Shopping

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Product Features


Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier than shopping on your desktop.

Never miss a delivery


Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing


Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale


Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password


Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you


Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you


Not sure of an item’s brand or where to buy it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

Product Description


Browse, search, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. We deliver to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Important Note Regarding Permissions


Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey_: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice, and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers:_ By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g., www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse (http://www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse)) and Privacy Notice (e.g., www.amazon.com/privacy (http://www.amazon.com/privacy)) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
descriptionShort: Browse, search & buy millions of products in tech, fashion and more!

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey_: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice, and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers:_ By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g., www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse (http://www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse)) and Privacy Notice (e.g., www.amazon.com/privacy (http://www.amazon.com/privacy)) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

container.value:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109

creator: Amazon Mobile LLC
descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, never miss amazing deals, compare prices and reviews and track your orders easily with the Amazon Shopping App!

Download the app now and start shopping our selection of fashion, books, toys, home appliances, sport accessories and much more.

Here are some of the reason why our users love shopping on the app:

- Easy
Compare prices and check availability instantly by using your voice, scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing in your search.
Access comprehensive product details and users’ reviews before buying.
Once you complete your order, track it easily and get notifications about your shipment.

- Convenient
Never miss a deal or a discount with easy access to Lighting Deals and Deal of the Day.
Get notifications when a new deal is available.
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options.
No need to create a new account to use your Prime membership benefits, to manage your 1-click settings and wish lists and to track your orders.

- Comprehensive
Whether you are looking for a specific product or you need ideas for your next gift, we got you covered.
Shop in fashion, sports & outdoor, home appliances, electronics, books and many other categories from all your favourite brands.

- Secure
All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers.

- Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping!

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast (not available for amazon.com.be).
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permission is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey_: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice, and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers:_ By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g., www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse (http://www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse)) and Privacy Notice (e.g., www.amazon.com/privacy (http://www.amazon.com/privacy)) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

descriptionHtml:
Free international shipping to Chile
Amazon.com offers free international shipping directly to the Chile on eligible items with order value of USD 49 or more (Restrictions Apply). Experience a hassle-free customs clearance process through prepaid duties and taxes.

Shop on the Amazon.com app for more than 70 million products
Search and shop for authentic, loved brands across a wide range of categories, including technology, beauty, fashion, travel, home, games, and more.

Know what you’re purchasing
See items from every angle with full 360° product view. Read customer ratings and reviews before making a purchase.

Shopping made easy
Shop in 9 different languages and pay in 75 currencies. Start shopping today for personalized product recommendations.

Shop with confidence
Experience safe and secure payments, easy returns, and live chat support 24 hours, 7 days a week.

Shop deals that ship to you
Shop daily and lightning deals across your favorite brands and categories.

Never forget your password
Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone’s keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom, Brazil, or Turkey: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

descriptionHtml:
Shop millions of products, find amazing deals, compare prices and reviews before you buy, and track your orders easily with the Amazon shopping app!

Download now to start shopping our selection of fashion, tech, books, toys, home appliances, groceries, and much more.

😌Shopping made easy
• Compare prices and check availability when shopping fashion, tech, groceries and more – with voice, barcode and image search.
• Never miss a deal or a discount with notifications and easy access to shop Lighting Deals and our Deal of the Day.
• See comprehensive product details and user reviews before you buy.
• Easily track your order and get shipment notifications.

📱Manage everything in-app
• Use your existing Amazon account to shop, track orders, access your shopping history and easily buy items again.
• Manage your Prime membership benefits, 1-click buy settings, payment and shipping options and shopping wish lists.

🔎 Search, shop and buy
• Shop fashion, tech, homeware, groceries and more from all your favourite brands.
• See shopping recommendations – whether you’re shopping for a gift or treating yourself to some new tech.

🔒 Shop with confidence
• All purchases are processed through Amazon’s secure servers, so you can buy with total peace of mind.

🌎 One app, multiple storefronts
• Shop and buy from Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp or amazon.com.be from a single app.

Download the app now and start shopping for fashion, tech, groceries, homeware, and more!
